title: Holiday Bonus: The Worst Apologies of All Time
itunes:title: Holiday Bonus: The Worst Apologies of All Time
description:
We're off this week admiring our bedroom trees and hero trees, but we wanted to leave you with another Lemonada Media podcast we think you'll love –– I'm Sorry.  This show is all about apologies and how they play out in the court of public opinion. On this episode of I’m Sorry, hosts Hoja, Mohanad, and Kiki reveal their picks for the worst apologies of all time. Who will take the crown? Will it be Shia LaBeouf’s plagiarized apology for plagiarism? Model Carissa Pinkston’s lie about being transgender in an apology for transphobic remarks? Or Mario Batali’s sexual assault apology slash cinnamon roll recipe? Listen to find out! I’m Sorry is back with brand new episodes on January 7th.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
